text: temane kahyum, tenum tari pase eka mendhi mangavum, tara para kharekhara atyacara che ane vadhare padata bhagidaro eka-bija para atireka kare che, imanavala ane satkaryo karanara sivaya ane ava loko ghana ocha che ane da'uda a.Sa. Samaji gaya ke ame temani kasoti kari che, pachi to potana palanaharathi maphi mangava lagya ane ajiji karata padi gaya ane vinamrata dakhavi
